summary: The town's leading citizen becomes a homicidal maniac after his wife deserts him.
cast: Bela Lugosi|Polly Ann Young|John McGuire|Clarence Muse|Terry Walker|Betty Compson|Ernie Adams|George Pembroke|Ottola Nesmith|Fred Kelsey|Jack Mulhall|Fred Aldrich|Robert F. Hill|Lloyd Ingraham|Robert Strange|Dorothy Vernon
title: El fantasma invisible
